trans-unit.source: Specifies the values that resolve a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> using the PNRP Namespace Provider API protocol.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os valores que resolver um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> utilizando o protocolo de API de fornecedor de espaço de nomes de PNRP.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> which contains all the information for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> that was published in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> or cloud(s) that were queried during the resolve process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>que contém todas as informações para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>que foi publicada no <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>ou nuvens que foram consultados durante o processo de resolução.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância predefinida do <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: After successfully resolving a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> contains all the information for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> that was published in the cloud(s) that were queried during the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Depois de resolver com êxito um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>, a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>contém todas as informações especificadas para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A>que foi publicada em nuvens que foram consultados durante a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>operação.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution data after the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Devolve elemento dados de resolução após o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"> </xref> o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer name resolution data after peer resolution has completed.
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma chamada de retorno assíncrona utilizada para processar os dados de resolução de nomes do elemento de rede, uma vez concluída a resolução de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event is raised by the peer resolver object.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados podem substituir este método para efetuar adicionais as tarefas quando o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>o evento é gerado pelo objeto de resolução de peer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the data returned by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados devolvidos pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Returns peer resolution progress data when the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os dados de progresso de resolução de elemento quando o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"> </xref> o evento é gerado.

trans-unit.source: This method is an asynchronous callback used to process peer resolution data after peer resolution progress has been requested.
trans-unit.target: Este método é uma chamada de retorno assíncrona utilizada para processar os dados de resolução de peer depois foi solicitado o progresso de resolução de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: Derived types can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados podem substituir este método para efetuar adicionais as tarefas quando o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains peer name resolution progress information returned by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.ResolveProgressChangedEventArgs"></xref>objeto que contém o elemento de rede nome progresso as informações de resolução devolvidas pelo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Resolve especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> em todas as nuvens conhecidas para o elemento de chamada.

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Este método associa um nome de elemento de rede para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não é possível resolver o nome do elemento ou `null`, um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é emitida.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registado (e associado diferentes pontos finais) por elementos diferentes na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>método é semelhante ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método para cada registo de nome de ponto a ponto no <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que utilizar o método de resolver num registo de nome de elemento de rede individuais não invalidar resolver vários nomes de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is not supplied, the method uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in cloud parameters.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro não for fornecido, o método utiliza o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho para preencher os parâmetros de nuvem.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref> that contains all peer name records (represented as <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"> </xref> que contém todos os registos de nome de ponto a ponto (representado como <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos) associados com o nome do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> can be registered by different users in the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, os mesmos <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> pode ser registado por utilizadores diferentes na mesma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>e associou com pontos finais diferentes.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The peer name specified cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: O nome do elemento especificado não é possível resolver.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified peer name in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than the specified number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Resolve o nome do elemento especificado em todas as nuvens conhecidos para o elemento de chamada, devolvendo não mais do que o número especificado de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This method associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Este método associa um nome de elemento de rede para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para o nome do elemento.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same peer name can be registered by different users in the same <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome de elemento de rede pode ser registado por utilizadores diferentes na mesma <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>e associou com pontos finais diferentes.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (for example, the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>não pode ser resolvido (por exemplo, o nome do elemento não se encontre publicado) um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é emitida.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects to obtain from all <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> objects for the supplied `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos para obter todos os <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> objetos para o fornecido `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A whose size is less than or equal to maxRecords entries.
trans-unit.target: A cujo tamanho é menor ou igual a maxRecords entradas.

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: Esta coleção contém registos de nome de elemento de rede associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> que foi resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é inferior ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível resolver o nome do elemento fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolve especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>especificado no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> cannot be resolved (i.e., the peer name is not published) an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>não pode ser resolvido (ou seja, o nome do elemento não se encontre publicado) um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é emitida.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registado (e associado diferentes pontos finais) por elementos diferentes na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>utiliza o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho para preencher o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the peer name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> na qual resolver o nome do elemento.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref> that contains all peer name records (represented as <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects) associated with the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection"></xref>que contém todos os registos de nome de ponto a ponto (representado como <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos) associados com o nome do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> can be registered by different users in the same <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, and associated with different endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, os mesmos <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> pode ser registado por utilizadores diferentes na mesma <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>e associou com pontos finais diferentes.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível resolver o nome do elemento fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>, returning no more than the specified number of <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Resolve especificado <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>especificado no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>, devolvendo não mais do que o número especificado de <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registado (e associado diferentes pontos finais) por elementos diferentes na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome do elemento não pode ser resolvido, um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é emitida.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> uses the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut to fill in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>utiliza o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho para preencher o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> na qual resolver o `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of peer name record objects to obtain from the specified cloud for the specified `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de objetos de registo de nome de ponto a ponto para obter a partir da nuvem especificada para o especificado `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A whose size is less than or equal to maxRecords entries.
trans-unit.target: A cujo tamanho é menor ou igual a maxRecords entradas.

trans-unit.source: This collection contains peer name records associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> that was resolved.
trans-unit.target: Esta coleção contém registos de nome de elemento de rede associados a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> que foi resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The peerName parameter is set to .
trans-unit.target: The peerName parameter is set to .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é inferior ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: The supplied peer name cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível resolver o nome do elemento fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> in all clouds known to the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto assíncrona para especificada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>em todas as nuvens conhecidas para o elemento de chamada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Este método de forma assíncrona associa um nome de elemento de rede para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: It raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o nome do elemento não pode ser resolvido, um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é emitida.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registado (e associado diferentes pontos finais) por elementos diferentes na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver> method is similar to calling the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method for each peer name record in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>método é semelhante ao chamar o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método para cada registo de nome de ponto a ponto no <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver>

trans-unit.source: Note that using the Resolve method on an individual peer name record does not invalidate resolving multiple peer names.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que utilizar o método de resolver num registo de nome de elemento de rede individuais não invalidar resolver vários nomes de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos e o método Resolve destina-se do processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolução são coordenadas com um token de identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isto `userState` token ou mensagem identificador permite que um sistema operativo entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de receção depois da mensagem foi colocada em fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains state information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto definido pelo utilizador que contém informações de estado sobre a operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros estão definidos como .

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified in all clouds known to the calling peer, returning no more than maxRecords entries for the peer name.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto assíncrona para especificado em todas as nuvens conhecidas para o elemento de chamada, devolvendo não mais do que maxRecords entradas para o nome do elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method asynchronously associates a peer name to clouds.
trans-unit.target: Este método de forma assíncrona associa um nome de elemento de rede para nuvens.

trans-unit.source: All clouds are queried for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as nuvens são consultadas para <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registado (e associado diferentes pontos finais) por elementos diferentes na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: If the peer name cannot be resolved or is `null`, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não é possível resolver o nome do elemento ou `null`, um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>é emitida.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos e o método Resolve destina-se do processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolução são coordenadas com um token de identificador exclusivo <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isto `userState` token ou mensagem identificador permite que um sistema operativo entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de receção depois da mensagem foi colocada em fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain for the Peer Name.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de registos para obter para o nome do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto definido pelo utilizador que contém informações sobre a operação resolve.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros estão definidos como .

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é inferior ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto assíncrona para especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> especificado no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registado (e associado diferentes pontos finais) por elementos diferentes na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, o nome for resolvido através de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho, que inicializa os valores predefinidos para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos e o método Resolve destina-se do processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolução são coordenadas com um token de identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isto `userState` token ou mensagem identificador permite que um sistema operativo entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de receção depois da mensagem foi colocada em fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to resolve the `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> na qual resolver o `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined <xref:System.Object> that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: Um definido pelo utilizador <xref:System.Object>que contém informações sobre a operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros estão definidos como .

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous peer name resolution operation for the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> in the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto assíncrona para especificado <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> especificado no <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The resolution operation will resolve no more than maxRecords entries for the specified peer name.
trans-unit.target: A operação de resolução irá resolver não mais do que maxRecords entradas para o nome do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: For unsecured peer names, the same name can be registered (and associated with different endpoints) by different peers within the same cloud.
trans-unit.target: Para nomes de elemento de rede não segura, o mesmo nome pode ser registado (e associado diferentes pontos finais) por elementos diferentes na mesma nuvem.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveCompleted%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Or, it raises the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event, which calls back to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ou, gera o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento, o que chama de volta para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.OnResolveProgressChanged%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud> parameter is `null`, the name is resolved using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>parâmetro é `null`, o nome for resolvido através de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>atalho, que inicializa os valores predefinidos para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, e <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A> method, there is an equivalent <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>método, há um equivalente <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>método.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Their parameter lists are identical, except that the ResolveAsync method includes a system token for asynchronous event handling, and the Resolve method is intended for synchronous processing.
trans-unit.target: As listas de parâmetro são idênticas, exceto que o método ResolveAsync inclui um token de sistema para o processamento assíncrono de eventos e o método Resolve destina-se do processamento síncrono.

trans-unit.source: All asynchronous references to the peer resolver object are coordinated with a unique identifier token <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Todas as referências assíncronas para o objeto de resolução de ponto a ponto se coordenada com um token de identificador exclusivo <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This `userState` token or message identifier allows an operating system to deliver a message to a single receiving process after the message has been placed on the message queue.
trans-unit.target: Isto `userState` token ou mensagem identificador permite que um sistema operativo entregar uma mensagem para um único processo de receção depois da mensagem foi colocada em fila de mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event will be raised if the resolve operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>evento é acionado se a operação resolve é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The `peerName` to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O `peerName` para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The `cloud` in which to resolve `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O `cloud` no qual pretende resolver `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of records to obtain from `cloud` for `peerName`.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de registos para obter a partir de `cloud` para `peerName`.

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that contains information about the peer name resolution operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto definido pelo utilizador que contém informações sobre a operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the peerName and userState parameters are set to .
trans-unit.target: Uma ou ambas as peerName e userState parâmetros estão definidos como .

trans-unit.source: One or more supplied parameters are invalid.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais parâmetros fornecidos são inválidos.

trans-unit.source: Successful completion of this operation requires at least one event handler.
trans-unit.target: A conclusão com êxito esta operação requer pelo menos um processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The maxRecords parameter is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: O maxRecords parâmetro é inferior ou igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the specified asynchronous peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o pedido de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto assíncrona especificada.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method guarantees the system will not attempt to obtain additional records for the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método garante que o sistema não vai tentar obter registos adicionais para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> especificada

trans-unit.source: If this method is called when an asynchronous peer name resolution operation is not outstanding, it acts as a "no operation" (NO OP).
trans-unit.target: Se este método é denominado quando uma operação de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto assíncrona não pendente, este funciona como uma "nenhuma operação de" (OP não).

trans-unit.source: The `userState` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call when multiple calls are in progress.
trans-unit.target: O `userState` deve ser fornecido um objeto, porque é utilizado para controlar uma chamada assíncrona específica quando várias chamadas estão em curso.

trans-unit.source: This caller-supplied object is unique for each peer name resolution request.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto fornecido pelo chamador é exclusivo para cada pedido de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: This method will return immediately, but the operation may or may not immediately cancel.
trans-unit.target: Este método irá devolver imediatamente, mas a operação pode ou não pode cancelar imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments returned by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted> event contains a field which can be polled by clients to determine whether cancellation occurred.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de eventos devolvidos pelo <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>de eventos contém um campo que pode ser consultado pelos clientes para determinar se o cancelamento ocorreu.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method ensures the ResolveCompleted event will be signaled as soon as possible with the event argument <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método garante o evento ResolveCompleted será indicado logo que possível, com o argumento do evento <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>definido como `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object provided to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*> method instance which started the resolve operation.
trans-unit.target: O objecto fornecido para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>instância do método que iniciou a operação resolve.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The userState parameters cannot be .
trans-unit.target: O userState parameters não podem ser .

trans-unit.source: The ResolveCompleted event is signaled when a peer name resolution request for a specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: O evento ResolveCompleted está assinalado quando um pedido de resolução de nome de ponto a ponto para específico <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>foi concluída.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged> event will be raised once for each endpoint found, and this event will be raised only once when all endpoints have been found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>evento é acionado uma vez para cada ponto final encontrado e este evento é acionado apenas uma vez quando todos os pontos finais foram encontrados.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event will also be raised if the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A> operation completes in error or is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Este evento também será desencadeado se a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>operação é concluída no erro ou foi cancelada.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.Resolve%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This event is signaled whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> object is found in response to a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*> operation for a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é assinalado sempre que um <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> objeto encontra-se em resposta a um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>operação específico <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameResolver.ResolveAsync*>

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> objects exist in the cloud(s) being queried, this event is signaled once for each <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> found.
trans-unit.target: Se vários <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>objetos existem nas nuvens a ser consultados, este evento é assinalado uma vez para cada <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>encontrado.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
